short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fix Youtube's long gone dislikes numbers with emoticons rating system!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows to show accurate ratings for Youtube videos. Features:
- Colourful emoticons for different ratings
- Analyses all video stats and a complex algorithm determines how good it is
- Extremely lightweight
